about: I'm a Junior at UC Santa Barbara majoring in CS. As part of my university's BS/MS combined degree, I plan to complete my Bachelor's degree in Spring 2025 and my Master's in Spring 2026. My primary research interests are in Programming Languages, Computer Architecture and Program Verification.
I've been the assistant social media manager of the UCSB Game Development Club for the past year and work on all sorts of personal programming and game development projects in my free time.
